content.rendered:
Super Mario Bros is a side-scrolling 2D platform game with amazing fantasy adventure.

Play Super Mario Bros Online

It is the latest entry in the long running New Super Mario Bros series. The game features a large variety of new power-ups that players can utilize on their quest to rescue the princess from Bowser’s clutches. Collect coins, dont stop running and unlock many characters as Luigi, Toad, Mario and more!

How to Play Super Mario Bros

  • Use the mouse click to run and jump Mobile and Tablet controls: tap the screen to run and jump.
  • Play free games online without downloading.

Also read :

  • Super Mario Bros Review
  • What is the Most Trending Game right now?
  • The Best Nintendo Switch Games With Bowling For Fans
